item.title: Documents
item.description: ‚ö†Ô∏è This list is evolving, and will be expanded in future. The Vekllei Document System is an internal circular provided by the Government of Vekllei to direct policy. They do not represent policy in depth – rather, documents are issued discretely to relevant ministries and outline the direction or spirit of policy. Historically, they announce major events and actions. Documents üìÑDocument No. 1: CommuniqueÃÅ on the Establishment of the 4th Commonwealth üìÑDocument No.

item.title: Education
item.description: Overview # ﬂ∑ This article is about Vekllei. It UNFINISHED and will be completed in the next couple days. Education emerged as a foundational right for Vekllei people in the constitution of the 4th Commonwealth, in the spirit of postwar democratisation and the rising of all people. Education in Vekllei is a good example of the ‘system working backwards,’ the popular phrase to describe the Floral Period moving in two different directions at once.

item.title: Espionage
item.description: Overview # ﬂ∑ This article is about Vekllei. Espionage is a considerable strength of the 4th Commonwealth, while also incurring a growing cost. Its assertive and risky operations, some of which have ended in catastrophe, inflict considerable damage on its image abroad, and isolate it from European and American powers. But this assertiveness has also built a fearsome, modern and sprawling intelligence network that meets or surpasses even that of much greater superpowers.

item.title: Finance
item.description: Overview # ﬂ∑ This article is about Vekllei Even if they do not use money, Vekllei people do have finances and engage with markets, maintain business relations and acquire financial instruments for upward mobility. The Vekllei state, on the other hand, is an enthusiastic participant in the global financial system and uses its considerable advantages enabled by the isolated moneyless Vekllei economy to accomplish its strategic political interests. The colloquial turn-of-phrase for the domestic Vekllei economy is “functionally moneyless,” but the actual mechanisms of the internal Vekllei market is considerably more complex.

item.title: Housing
item.description: ﬂ∑ This article is about Vekllei Housing in Vekllei is socialised in the Georgist tradition. It is a recognition that all wealth lies in land, the resources beneath it, and the peoplee that work it. In this sense, housing in Vekllei is just as radical and striking as its moneylessness. All real estate in Vekllei is negotiated, purchased and leased at a municipal level. This system depends heavily on stewardship as a factor of ownership.
